name: Dice Simulator
description:
The perfect addition to your weekly round of pen and paper!

If you have to throw a lot of dice, this is the tool of choice!
I developed this little dice simulator to make my life as a Dungeon Master of a D&D group easier.
Don't disable the dice limitation, if you don't want the game to crash. ;)

If you like what you see, please do not hesitate to leave a comment or check out my portfolio at david-schreiber.de.
